body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit        The Memorial Garden includes the gravesite of César E. Chávez.        Explore the legacy of César E. Chávez at two side-by-side sites in the monument named for him: In the Memorial Garden, you will find his gravesite and a fountain honoring the memory of five workers. Roses in bloom year-round, including a variety named for Chávez, grace the garden. In the visitor center, watch films about his life, contemplate his unchanged office, and see exhibits and artwork. A bookstore offers additional information.  If you'd like to plan a trip, look at our basic information for operating hours and seasons and information about traveling with pets. For a driving map, check our information about directions and transportation. Before your visit, check our safety and accessibility information. Our virtual tour offers an opportunity to explore the monument online. Follow the main path, or explore on your own through 360-degree panoramic photos.
title: César E. Chávez National Monument: Plan Your Visit
